org.neilja.net.interruptiblermi
Class InterruptibleRMIThreadFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.neilja.net.interruptiblermi.InterruptibleRMIThreadFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory
public class InterruptibleRMIThreadFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory

ThreadFactory implementation to support interruptibility of RMI calls. Use getInstance() to get an instance of this class. If an RMI call is made from a thread instance returned by this factory, and the RMI call uses a socket from InterruptibleRMISocketFactory, then calling #interrupt on the thread instance while thread is in a blocking RMI IO operation will result in the IO operation terminating. (Typically RMI IO operations cannot be interrupted).

Author:
neilotoole@apache.org
